description.narrative: This initiative provides assistance to the United Nations Relief and Works Agency's (UNRWA's) work in supporting Palestinian refugees in Gaza, the West Bank, Jordan, Lebanon and Syria and is in addition to the base and performance-linked payments outlined in the AusAID-UNRWA Partnership Agreement. UNRWA remains the primary human services provider for the Occupied Palestinian Territories. For most Palestinian refugees, UNRWA is the only significant provider of services, particularly in Lebanon where refugee access to Lebanese government services and assistance is extremely limited. Overall approximately 4.7 million Palestinian refugees receive support from UNRWA. This funding will support UNRWA to provide food allowances to 600,000 refugees, continue with the job creation program for 10,000 Gazans and continue its Gazan school feeding program for another semester. The initiative also provides assistance to the Gaza office through the UNRWA Summer Games 2011. The total value of this ini
